## Questions

- Methods for modelling and summarizing data from multiple participants
    - Complete pooling: Fitting aggregate (averaged) data
    - No pooling: Fitting individual data (independently)
    - Partial pooling: Fitting individual data using multilevel models


- Implications (dangers) of averaging

![](../../assets/images/aggregating-power-law.png)

## No pooling

Two-stage analysis: Fitting parameters to each individual participant, and then performing statistical tests at group level.

Dangers: over-fitting
